name: Gifted Voice
description:
Story

The fortunate have been lucky enough, it's time for the poor to get some luck today.

Help Karel steal from the rich humans and give to the oh so poor and unfortunate demons. 

Everyone deserves some love this week, but humans just a bit less.

Theme

The theme of this jam was Giving, so we made a game where you had to steal as many items within 60 seconds and give them away again within the next minute.

Credits

Developer - Joey  van der Wijk - Twitter

Developer - Coen Steuns 

Artist - Ivan 

Artist - Brandy - Art Station

Artist - Pupcific - Twitter

Extra

This is the 4th game in the Karel Universe.

The previous 3 are back in development and can be found here:

Used https://www.mixamo.com/#/ for animating the character.
